Header.title: Welcome to Kinmatech Online School
Header.paragraph: LEARN HTML/CSS IN 3 MONTHS & PHP/MYSQL IN 3 MONTHS.
Header.paragraph2: With your laptop and internet connection you are good to go

Why: Web programming training refers to the process of acquiring knowledge and skills in programming languages, frameworks, and tools used for developing websites and web applications.

Web programming involves writing code that runs on web servers and is responsible for generating dynamic content, interacting with databases, handling user input, and delivering web pages to browsers.

Contact.address: Beside Bishop Alex Lesson Centre, Aku Road, Nsukka

Features.title: Tutorial Contents on HTML/CSS and JAVASCRIPT
Features.text: Introduction to Object Oriented Programming Language (OOP) and HTML/CSS Basics. N100,000

Features.title: Tutorial Contents on Github, Vercel and Netlify
Features.text: Basics of DevOps like: Vercel and Netflify and how to use version control Github. N100,000.00

Features.title: Tutorial Contents on PHP
Features.text: Introduction to PHP, PHP Syntax and Variables etc. N100,000.00

Features.title: Tutorial Contents on PHPMYSQL
Features.text: Introduction to PHPMYSQL. How to use PHPMyAdmin to access your information from MYSQL database. N100,000.00
